p: Methanol, Ethyl Acetate, n-Hexane, Ferric Chloride, Acetic Anhydride, Dinitrobenzene Solution was bought from Merck, Germany; Potassium Mercuric Iodide, Sulphuric Acid, Nitric Acid and Acetic Acid was bought Sigma-Aldrich, USA; Diazepam and Diclofenac Sodium was bought from Square Pharmaceuticals Ltd., Bangladesh; and Pentobarbitone Sodium was bought from Incepta Pharmaceuticals Ltd., Bangladesh.
